item.description:
We are hosting a Winter/New Year/Solstice party at our home in Dracut. It'll be a pot luck affair, like the Darwin Day party was. Have good selection of video and board games. Recently we were gifted a copy of the comedy Jesus video. Also planning some mini-short timed group games.

Please contact us directly at prissydarian@yahoo.com or through this site for any questions/suggestions.

Since the time begins close to dinner; I'll have some food. It would be a great help for us if you can list any food/drink items on here or email me with what you may bring. All RSVPs will receive directions/phone number/parking instructions prior to sat.

Looking fwd to some great conversations and spending time with those of you who are able to join us!
item.name: Lindsay's and Darrick's Winter Party *New Date Due to Weather
